name: unquestionably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 in a way that is obvious and impossible to doubt: She is unquestionably good at physics. The operation has unquestionably improved the wellbeing of most patients. See
unquestionable
More examplesFewer examplesReforms to the voting system are unquestionably necessary.He made a difference to people's lives, unquestionably.Their children are unquestionably the centre of their life.
